task.title: French Toast
task.shortdesc: Prep time: 10 minutes. Cook time: 5 minutes. Serves: 2-3

ul.li: 3 slices of day-old French bread, ciabatta bread, or other sturdy bread

step.cmd: In a small bowl, whisk together the milk, maple syrup, flour, egg, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
In a small bowl, whisk together the almond milk, maple syrup, flour, egg, nutritional yeast, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
Place the bread in one of the teal soup bowls. Pour the mixture over the bread, then flip the bread over to make sure both sides are evenly coated.
Heat a bit of coconut in a large skillet over medium heat, enough to coat the pan. When the pan is hot, lay the bread slices and cook until golden brown, flipping once.
Serve with powdered sugar, a pat of butter, maple syrup, and fresh fruit.
Serve with powedered sugar, a pat of margarine maple syrup, and fresh fruit.
